og.description: Yahoo Fantasy Sports experienced a “glitch” on Wednesday when a “required machine was accidentally turned off.” One Twitter follower couldn’t resist a delicious bit of HealthCare.gov snark: @YahooFantasy You ran waivers over the same server which hosts http://t.co/hE6tbqpIp2? — ن Mikey Ramone ن (@ThePantau) November 13, 2013 This one’s gonna leave a mark: @ThePantau You …

article_summary:
@YahooFantasy FTW — ن Mikey Ramone ن (@ThePantau) November 13, 2013@ThePantau @YahooFantasy lmao, awesome — H (@Tark31) November 13, 2013@YahooFantasy LOVE!
RT @TheH2: LOL RT @JohnEkdahl: Hahaha https://t.co/3oVaoaXSLh — Top (@topsecretk9) November 13, 2013@topsecretk9 Yahoo's system actually works @JohnEkdahl — The H2 (@TheH2) November 13, 2013(Hat tip: @ThePantau)
— ن Mikey Ramone ن (@ThePantau) November 13, 2013This one’s gonna leave a mark:@ThePantau You missed the part where we said the waivers ran and are working.
Yahoo Fantasy Sports experienced a “glitch” on Wednesday when a “required machine was accidentally turned off.” One Twitter follower couldn’t resist a delicious bit of HealthCare.gov snark:@YahooFantasy You ran waivers over the same server which hosts http://t.co/hE6tbqpIp2?
😉 — Yahoo Fantasy Sports (@YahooFantasy) November 13, 2013Touchdown!
